resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82099</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82099</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3213</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Language Games</string>
            <string language="es">Cluichí Teanga</string>
            <string language="ga">Cluichí Teanga</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprachenspiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux de Langage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos Da Língua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi Di Linguaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γλωσσικά παιχνίδια</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a list of games you can play in the Irish class. Some of them come from English and others are newly invented.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta es una lista de juegos que se pueden jugar en la clase de irlandés. Algunos ellos proceden del inglés y otros son recién inventados.</string>
            <string language="ga">Is éard atá anseo ná liosta cluichí gur féidir a imirt sa rang Gaeilge. Tagann cuid acu díreach ón mBéarla agus cuid eile acu, is cluichí nua-chumtha ar fad iad.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speaking</string>
            <string language="es">Idioma hablado</string>
            <string language="ga">Labhairt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Additional Resource</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Liste der Spiele, die Sie in der 
irischen Kategorie spielen können. Einige von ihnen kommen von 
Englisch und andere werden eben erfunden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une liste de jeux que vous pouvez jouer 
dans la classe irlandaise. Certains d'entre eux viennent de 
l'anglais et d'autres sont nouvellement inventés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma lista dos jogos que você pode jogar 
na classe irish. Alguns deles vêm do inglês e outros são 
inventados recentemente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una lista dei giochi che potete giocare 
nel codice categoria irlandese. Alcuni di loro vengono 
dall'inglese ed altri recentemente sono inventati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένας κατάλογος παιχνιδιών που μπορείτε να
παίξετε στην ιρλανδική κλάση. Μερικοί από τους προέρχονται
από τα αγγλικά και άλλοι εφευρίσκονται πρόσφατα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parlare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομιλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
